Target Tiers:

Enterprise

Team Collaboration & Foundation

Building the foundation for team-based workflows and enhanced collaboration features

Organization Management

Create organizations, invite team members, and manage role-based access control with comprehensive usage tracking

Key Features:

  • Admin/Member/Viewer roles
  • Email invitations
  • Usage analytics
  • Organization-wide document sharing
Shared Workspaces

Organize documents into shared folders with granular permissions and collaborative annotations

Key Features:

  • Folder structure
  • Granular permissions
  • Activity feed
  • Collaborative annotations
Advanced Document Analysis

Enhanced AI-powered analysis with risk assessment, compliance checking, and key findings extraction

Key Features:

  • Risk assessment
  • Compliance checking
  • Key findings
  • Smart recommendations
Security Questions Requirement

Enhanced account security with mandatory security questions for document processing operations

Key Features:

  • Mandatory setup for new users
  • Account recovery options
  • Document operation protection
  • Argon2 encrypted storage
OWASP ASVS Security Implementation

Enterprise-grade security compliance with OWASP Application Security Verification Standard Level 1

Key Features:

  • JWT security validation
  • XSS protection & output encoding
  • File upload security
  • Path traversal prevention
  • Security monitoring & logging
  • 82% ASVS Level 1 compliance

API Access & Enterprise Integration

Professional-grade API access and enterprise-ready integration capabilities

API Access System

Complete API platform with key management, rate limiting, and comprehensive documentation

Key Features:

  • API key management
  • Rate limiting by tier
  • OpenAPI documentation
  • Multi-language SDKs
  • Usage analytics
SSO Integration

Single Sign-On with major providers including SAML 2.0 and OAuth 2.0/OpenID Connect support

Key Features:

  • Okta, Auth0, Azure AD
  • Google Workspace
  • User provisioning
  • Group mapping
Webhooks & Integrations

Real-time webhooks and pre-built integrations with popular workflow tools

Key Features:

  • Event notifications
  • Retry logic
  • Slack/Teams integration
  • Zapier templates

White-Label & Customization

Brand customization and deployment flexibility for enterprise customers

White-Label Platform

Complete branding customization with custom domains, logos, and color schemes

Key Features:

  • Custom subdomains
  • Logo & color themes
  • Custom email templates
  • Remove branding option
Multi-Language Support

Comprehensive support for analyzing legal documents in multiple languages

Key Features:

  • Spanish, French, German
  • Additional EU languages
  • Localized UI
  • Regional compliance
Custom Deployment Options

On-premise and private cloud deployment with enterprise-grade security

Key Features:

  • Docker/Kubernetes
  • Private cloud guides
  • Data residency
  • Backup & recovery

Help Us Build the Future of Legal Tech

Your donations directly fund the development of these features. Every contribution helps us maintain free access while building the tools that make legal documents more accessible to everyone.
